author: jdotpz
content:
#Want To Try This Blogging App?
[Pomax](https://twitter.com/TheRealPomax) has written a [neat app here](https://github.com/Pomax/Pomax.github.io).  Want to try it out for yourself?  Click on Authenticate in the upper right corner (it's hidden right now), and fill in gibberish.  

It will then show you the UI for posting, but won't write any changes to my page.

I made an animated gif to show you how!

![alt text](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2273146/testtheblog.gif "Demotime")
